thread.title: LIVE: Mukesh Ambani’s says Reliance Jio added 100 million subscribers in 170 days
thread.title_full: LIVE: Mukesh Ambani’s says Reliance Jio added 100 million subscribers in 170 days

author: FE Online
title: LIVE: Mukesh Ambani’s says Reliance Jio added 100 million subscribers in 170 days
text:
LIVE: Mukesh Ambani’s says Reliance Jio added 100 million subscribers in 170 days LIVE: Mukesh Ambani’s says Reliance Jio added 100 million subscribers in 170 days Reliance Industries' Chairman and Managing Director Mukesh Ambani will address the Reliance Jio Conference on Tuesday, possibly keeping up with the trend of having a big announcement. By: FE Online | Updated: February 21, 2017 2:15 PM Mukesh Ambani might also go on to announce its new feature phone, 4G VOLTE with free data and other services. (Reuters) 
Reliance Industries ’ Chairman and Managing Director Mukesh Ambani will address the Reliance Jio Conference on Tuesday, possibly keeping up with the trend of having a big announcement. Although the company has not given any idea to the public about the major announcement that might be happening today, it is widely expected that the company might announce an extension of its free services to a later date. Mukesh Ambani might also go on to announce its new feature phone, 4G VOLTE with free data and other services. IYT has to be remembered that Reliance Jio has crossed over 100 million subscribers. You can watch the live stream of the event on the company’s Facebook and Twitter accounts. You can also watch it below, direct from its Youtube channel. 
02:15 PM: “With Jio, your life is digital, and your life is beautiful”, Mr Mukesh Ambani 
02:15 PM: Jio Prime Members can get this tremendous value at an introductory price of only Rs 303/month, effectively just Rs 10/day 
02:15 PM: Mukesh Ambani: Jio Prime members to have benefits like unlimited usage for 12 months. 
02:13 PM: Mukesh Ambani: To launch Jio Prime membership programme at one-time fee of Rs 99. 
02:12 PM: Jio Prime Members can continue enjoying the unlimited benefits of JIO NEW YEAR OFFER until 31st March, 2018. 
02:11 PM: “Today I show my gratitude to you, the initial #100MillionOnJio & to ensure you always continue to get extreme value”. – Mukesh Ambani 
02:10 PM: Mukesh Ambani: ‘Promise to always offer better value for best price’. 
02:09 PM: Mukesh Ambani: Jio will provide world-class quantity & quality of data at affordable rates. 
02:08 PM: Your invaluable & constructive feedback inspired us to set new benchmarks in customer experience and technical excellence. 
02:07 PM: Jio will match the highest selling tariff of other operators and provide 20% more data than what other operators provide 
02:06 PM: On all of Jio’s tariff plans, all domestic voice calls to any network will always remain free Mukesh Ambani: Jio will start offering tariff plans from April 1. pic.twitter.com/EwASSo60LF 
— ET NOW (@ETNOWlive) February 21, 2017 
02:05 PM: We are making our network stronger, better and faster. By the end of 2017, jio will be present in all the villages, towns and cover 90% of population in the country 
02:04 PM: Hope more customers will port their numbers to Jio 
02:04 PM: Will more than double data capacity in coming months 
02:04 PM: Have double number of 4G base stations of all other operators combined. 
02:04 PM: Jio will start offering tariff plans from April 1 
02:03 PM: “Jio was conceived to be a steadfast partner to India, and Indians, in our digital transformation”- Mukesh Ambani 
02:03 PM: With the Aadhaar-based process, initiating Mobile Number Portability has become a simple and fast process 
02:02 PM: Jio has more than double the number of 4G base stations when compared to all the other Indian operators put together 
02:01 PM: “To all our customers, I say thank you”– Mr Mukesh Ambani 
02:00 PM: Jio users consumed more than 100Cr GB of data per month on the Jio network! That’s more than 3.3Cr GB a day 
01:59 PM: Jio carries nearly 5.5 crore hours of video daily on its network 
01: 58 PM: Jio users consumed more than 100Cr GB of data per month on the Jio network! That’s more than 3.3Cr GB a day 
01: 57 PM: Jio users have consumed more than 100 cr gigabytes of data 
01:56 PM : Jio has added, on average, nearly 7 customers on its network every second of every day 
01:55 PM: 170 days since its launch, Jio has crossed the 100 million customer mark on its 4G LTE network 
01:52 PM: Jio has crossed 100 million subscribers 
1:50 PM: The event seems to have been delayed. Please Wait while comments are loading...
